name: Bounce Light!
description:
Create your very own rainbow with Bounce Light!

Rotate the mirrors in each level to make sure you match the color beams with the correct dot to complete the level.
Make sure you don't get tangled up, as you'll have to use prisms and color changers to help you complete the game.
Enjoy the satisfaction of seeing your dots light up in each level!

Bounce Light! features:
- Easy turn controls
- Satisfying level based gameplay
- Increasingly challenging puzzles
